Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off and turn right until the edge of swimming pool and trees is on the right side view. fly forward until seeing the more buildings. turn right to seeing the big buildings. fly along the right edge of blue buildings.]. At the initial position, you are asked to navigate according to a series of movement instructions. What are you doing now?  
choose:  
A. I turn right at the building.  
B. I fly forward and gradually descend.  
C. I turn right until the edge of the pool and the trees appear in the right view.  
D. I go across the water.  
E. I take off and turn right.
